channel.title: Walking
channel.description:
Hello eveyone,
Any idea on how the new sector-based color changes could be handled?
Tolerances alone? DTM's to find colors? (I'm not sure how this one would be done though...) Have editable/updateable DTMs ever been implemented?
Weren't autocolor scripts based on known locations?
Or would it be a matter of detecting the "loading please wait" screen and having autocolor procedures for each sector travelled?
Your opinion?
Goodbye,
Darkshado

item.title: Walking
item.dc:creator: @doomsday doomsday
item.description:
@doomsday wrote:

use radial road walk from srl, i hear it works great

Read full topic
